languages.text: "Я могу предоставить вам несколько тысяч голов отличных покорных слуг. Однако, как ни печально это говорить, я смогу отправить людей только когда мы разберемся с мятежом на планете. Уверен, долго ждать вам не придется. Чернь скоро получит достойное наказание за свои еретические козни".

traits.locale_text: "Как известно всему {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Коронусу{/g}, Райкад Минорис — это кузница великолепных покорителей пустоты. Я могу предоставить вам до нескольких тысяч отличных, обученных людей, готовых к путешествию".

languages.text: "I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretical scheming."
languages.original_text: "Я могу предоставить вам несколько тысяч голов отличных покорных слуг. Однако, как ни печально это говорить, я смогу отправить людей только когда мы разберемся с мятежом на планете. Уверен, долго ждать вам не придется. Чернь скоро получит достойное наказание за свои еретические козни".

traits.locale_text: "I can offer you several thousand heads of fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to say I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretic scheming."

"I can offer you several thousand heads of fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to say I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretic scheming."

"I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretic scheming."

"I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretic scheming."

"I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretical scheming."

"I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretical scheming."

languages.text: "Ich kann Euch mehrere tausend gute, gehorsame Diener anbieten. Ich muss Euch jedoch leider informieren, dass ich das erst tun kann, wenn wir den Aufstand auf dem Planeten niedergeschlagen haben. Ihr werdet gewiss nicht lange warten müssen. Der Pöbel wird schon bald gebührend für seine ketzerischen Intrigen bestraft werden."
languages.original_text: "I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretical scheming."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Euch mehrere tausend gute, gehorsame Diener anbieten. Ich muss Euch jedoch leider informieren, dass ich das erst tun kann, wenn wir den Aufstand auf dem Planeten niedergeschlagen haben. Ihr werdet gewiss nicht lange warten müssen. Der Pöbel wird schon bald gebührend für seine ketzerischen Intrigen bestraft werden."

languages.text: « Je peux vous offrir plusieurs milliers de bons serviteurs obéissants. Cependant, je suis au regret de vous informer que je ne pourrai pas le faire tant que nous n'aurons pas réglé le problème d'insurrection sur la planète. Je suis sûr que vous n'aurez pas à attendre longtemps. La populace sera bientôt dûment châtiée pour ses manigances hérétiques. »
languages.original_text: "I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretical scheming."

traits.locale_text: « Je peux vous offrir plusieurs milliers de bons serviteurs obéissants. Cependant, je suis au regret de vous informer que je ne pourrai pas le faire tant que nous n'aurons pas réglé le problème d'insurrection sur la planète. Je suis sûr que vous n'aurez pas à attendre longtemps. La populace sera bientôt dûment châtiée pour ses manigances hérétiques. »

languages.text: “我可以为您提供几千名听话的优秀仆人。不过，我得遗憾地补充一下，这件事情恐怕得等到这颗行星的叛乱解决之后才行。我相信您不会等太久，这群胆敢策划阴谋的乌合之众，他们很快就会被绳之以法。”
languages.original_text: "I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretical scheming."

traits.locale_text: “我可以为您提供几千名听话的优秀仆人。不过，我得遗憾地补充一下，这件事情恐怕得等到这颗行星的叛乱解决之后才行。我相信您不会等太久，这群胆敢策划阴谋的乌合之众，他们很快就会被绳之以法。”

languages.text: 「従順で優秀な従者を数千人提供可能だ。しかし、この惑星の反乱を何とかするまでは、残念だがそれは実現しない。長くは待たせないと思っている。暴徒共は間もなく、異端臭い企みをしたことで正当に罰せられるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretical scheming."

traits.locale_text: 「従順で優秀な従者を数千人提供可能だ。しかし、この惑星の反乱を何とかするまでは、残念だがそれは実現しない。長くは待たせないと思っている。暴徒共は間もなく、異端臭い企みをしたことで正当に罰せられるだろう」

languages.text: «Puedo ofrecerle varios miles de buenos y obedientes sirvientes. Sin embargo, me entristece informarle de que no podré hacerlo hasta que nos hayamos ocupado de la insurrección en el planeta. Seguro que no tendrá que esperar mucho. La chusma pronto será debidamente castigada por sus herejías».
languages.original_text: "I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretical scheming."

traits.locale_text: «Puedo ofrecerle varios miles de buenos y obedientes sirvientes. Sin embargo, me entristece informarle de que no podré hacerlo hasta que nos hayamos ocupado de la insurrección en el planeta. Seguro que no tendrá que esperar mucho. La chusma pronto será debidamente castigada por sus herejías».

languages.text: "Size birkaç bin düzgün ve itaatkâr hizmetkâr sunabilecek olsam da gezegenimizdeki isyanla başa çıkana dek elim kolum bağlı maalesef. Lakin sizi çok bekletmeyeceğimizden eminim. Kâfirce entrikalar peşindeki o ayaktakımının, hak ettikleri cezayı çekecekleri gün yakındır."
languages.original_text: "I can offer you several thousand fine, obedient servants. However, I'm sad to inform you that I won't be able to do it until we've dealt with the insurgency on the planet. I'm sure you won't have to wait long. The rabble will soon be duly punished for their heretical scheming."

traits.locale_text: "Size birkaç bin düzgün ve itaatkâr hizmetkâr sunabilecek olsam da gezegenimizdeki isyanla başa çıkana dek elim kolum bağlı maalesef. Lakin sizi çok bekletmeyeceğimizden eminim. Kâfirce entrikalar peşindeki o ayaktakımının, hak ettikleri cezayı çekecekleri gün yakındır."
